p: There are several reports on the importation of arboviruses such as CHIK by travelers to other countries [ 19]. In case the vector is present in the destination country, it is likely that the virus is transmitted to vectors and, therefore, the disease could become endemic in that country. The first CHIK outbreak in Italy is a typical example of this issue. In 2007, CHIKV was reportedly introduced to Italy by a viremic worker traveling from India to the Northeast part of the country where Ae. albopictus mosquitoes were already established [ 30].
